features: 【Large Capacity 7-Tier Shoe Rack】The closed shoe rack (49'' L * 36'' W * 11.4'' H) with each 7'' tier space, tall shoe rack can hold up to 28 pairs of all styles shoes. The 11.4'' depth accommodates shoes up to US size 12. Great for fit high heels, slippers, hats, boots, bags, keys, and other accessories. Shoe rack for closet room organization can help you maximize your vertical space.

【Shoe Rack with Cover】The environmentally friendly nonwoven fabric cover shoe storage keeps your shoes dustproof and less exposed better protecting your privacy. The rollable cover door design gives you the option of using it either closed or open, cubby storage organizer perfect for putting in a variety of storage rooms.

【Sturdy and Durability】Made of high-quality metal tube, thickened PP connectors, and waterproof nonwoven fabric. This shoes shelves has 6 connectors per tier, 2 more than other styles making this shoe stand holder have better stability. Can be placed in the hallway, entryway, garage, living room, bedroom, entrance, and narrow dormitory.

【Easy to Assemble】The shoe organization and storage come with numbered parts and detailed illustrated instructions, or you can check out the installation video, which can be easily assembled without additional tools and takes almost 30 minutes. If you have any questions about the shoe storage cabinet installation process, please feel free to contact us.

【Satisfactory After-sales】If there are quality problems after receiving mens shoe rack hidden, please feel free to contact us, We can provide professional guidance and provide you with solutions until you are satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great shoe rack storage
reviews.reviewText: This neat and functional shoe storage unit is a super bargain. The unit is easy to assemble once you figure out which piece is for which. It is sturdy enough to hold 28 pairs of shoes (with wooden shoe trees inside). For boots, you have to store them sideways so that it will reduce the storage capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing definitely works great, especially in small spaces. I bought two and they neatly fit in my closet. Easy to put together., simple as 1,2,3. Sturdy and way more attractive than shoe boxes piled on top of each other. Or shoes lined up against the wall. Also keeps them dust free. For the price point, I hope nobody is complaining about a single thing. It’s perfect for what it costs.

reviews.reviewerName: True to size! Warm, insulated and nice. Glad I bought 2
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The shelving parts are like a soft vinyl. Not very durable. The size is true. Confusion on directions to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, very light, big enough. Over all is excellent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome shoe organizer
reviews.reviewText: This was a great Christmas present for my wife. It was simple to put together and took about 15 minutes. Holds lots of shoes and I would recommend this product to people looking to have a nice stable shoe organizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent Shoe Holder for Lightweight Shoes, but Not Exceptionally Durable
reviews.reviewText: This rack serves its purpose of organizing lightweight shoes, there are a few drawbacks that I'd like to highlight in this review.First and foremost, the shoe holder does a decent job of holding and organizing shoes. The design allows you to neatly display up to 28 pairs, helping to save space and keep your footwear collection organized. It is especially suitable for lightweight shoes such as sandals, flats, and sneakers.However, one aspect that left me slightly disappointed was the overall durability of the shoe holder. While it held up well for the lighter shoes mentioned earlier, it struggled with heavier or bulkier footwear. The construction is not as sturdy as I would have liked, and I noticed some bending and warping when trying to accommodate larger shoes or boots.Another minor concern I had was with regards to cleanliness. The material used for the shoe holder tends to accumulate dust and dirt relatively quickly. While this can be easily managed with regular cleaning, I would have preferred a more dirt-resistant or easy-to-clean material.It's important to note that the price of the shoe holder reflects its quality. While it may not be as durable or as easy to clean as higher-end options, it does offer a cost-effective solution for organizing and storing lightweight shoes. If you're willing to make some compromises in terms of durability and cleanliness, it can still serve its purpose well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!! Exceeded my expectations!! Truly amazing!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have high hopes for this shoe organizer, I thought it was going to either break putting it together. Or it was not going to have enough space for all my shoes. I have over 30 pairs of shoes and I have more on the way. I've tried the plastic shoe box organizers and they constantly came apart at the doors. This shoe organizer to me is the best I own I would have paid 100$ for this!! And I still have room for a few more pairs of shoes!!! I love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits all my shoes
reviews.reviewText: This fits all my shoes except my high too boots, but it is really cute side note, put the rack in the place you want it to go before placing the shoes on the rack. Or it will start to come apart in some areas while carrying to the spot but easy to snap back in place.
This looks so cheap and so bad that after spending about an hour assembling it, I disassembled and sent it back immediately because of how terrible it looked.
